definition: to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish

sentences.english: Examine the host for dents, kinks, deformation or chafing.
sentences.chinese: 檢查軟管是否有凹坑，紐結，變形或擦傷。

sentences.english: This too looked red and raw. There was no bandage.
sentences.chinese: 這裏也紅紅的，好像擦傷了，但是沒有裹上繃帶。

sentences.english: the scraped escapee taped the grapes into various shapes.
sentences.chinese: 擦傷的已逃走犯用帶子把蒲萄紮成各種外形。

sentences.english: She suffered facial bruising and a fractured vertebra in the attack.
sentences.chinese: 在那次襲擊中她臉部擦傷，椎骨破裂。

sentences.english: The automobile was a total wreck, but the driver luckily escaped with minor cuts and abrasions .
sentences.chinese: 汽車只剩下殘骸，但司機卻很幸運，只是一點擦傷。

sentences.english: They were careful to treat the abraded skin.
sentences.chinese: 他們小心地處理着我身上每一寸擦傷的皮膚。
他的捏擰擦傷了桃子的表面。

sentences.english: Another worker surnamed Li, is the body abrasion, not life threatening.
sentences.chinese: 另一名李姓工人，則是身體擦傷，沒有生命危險。

sentences.english: They can be used for skin dermabrasion.
sentences.chinese: 它們可用於皮膚擦傷處。

sentences.english: Electricity is widely used in cutting and chaffing of crops.
sentences.chinese: 電力的廣泛應用在切割和擦傷的莊稼。

sentences.english: I use it now to besmear of body or scrape.
sentences.chinese: 現在我還用它來塗身上的淤青和小擦傷。

sentences.english: On the cape the scraped escapee taped the grapes into various shapes.
sentences.chinese: 在海角上，擦傷的逃犯用帶子把葡萄紮成各種形狀。

sentences.english: I creased my skin against the edge of the door.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮膚在門邊上擦傷了點。

sentences.english: I fell off my moped and I got a bruise.
sentences.chinese: 我從助動車上摔下來並擦傷了。

sentences.english: The stirrup leathers rubbed raw patches on his legs.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹬皮帶把他腿上的皮膚擦傷引起疼痛。

sentences.english: The saddle galled the horse's back.

definition: a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate
